front.title: Use of GRE for routing support in IPSec VPNs

abstract.t: When IPSec tunneling is used for VPN connections, transporting routingprotocols across the encrypted tunnels becomes challenging. Thisdocument outlines the use of GRE encapsulation in conjunction withIPSec transport mode to support transport of dynamic routing protocolsacross an IPSec encrypted tunnel. Some usage scenarios are alsoaddressed in this document.
